pageTitle: Re: ZS9-Where's the USB port on Camera Itself?: Panasonic Compact Camera Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   If you look on page 9 of the user guide you will see the door on the side with the USB input. I think they call it the audio/video output. It is a small plug on the camera and the other end is a standard USB for your computer. Page 9 here: http://service.us.panasonic.com/OPERMANPDF/DMCZS9.PDF Clancyboy Jan 23, 2012 dog46, In reply to Re:
